narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Light Center Behavioral Health LLC is a Clinic/Center, Multi-Specialty provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $8.2M in Medicaid payments across 31K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $8.2M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
